articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Unit 405
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Unit 405
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and  first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, inspected KPA Unit 405.
					 He had a photo session with service personnel of the unit after giving a pair of binoculars and automatic rifle to the company directly under the unit, expressing belief that its service personnel would defend the dear socialist homeland as firm as an iron wall.
					
					 He looked round the room devoted to the history of the unit.
					
					 He said General Secretary Kim Jong Il had particular expectation and concern towards the unit.
					
					 He told the officers and men to unite in one mind and develop the unit into stalwart steel-strong combat ranks, bearing deep in mind Kim Jong Il's noble will enshrined in the proud colors of the unit whenever they face difficulties and bottlenecks.
					
					 Watching the photo of Ju Tong Gil, former commander of the unit, who died in the line of duty while making devoted efforts to round off the combat preparations of the unit, he recollected Ju whom Kim Jong Il missed.
					
					 Kim Jong Un went round the library where he saw different kinds of books and materials for ideological and cultural education sent by the WPK.
					
					 He dropped in at an operation study room where he received a report on the unit's performance of duty and its trainings.
					
					 He said the unit has a very important mission to fulfill, setting forth important tasks that would serve as guidelines for rounding off its combat preparations.
					
					 He looked round the mess hall, non-staple foodstuff store and bean store.
					
					 He then moved to a company directly under the unit. Going round bedroom, education room and wash-cum-bath room, he praised the company for having provided its soldiers with all conditions so that they may not feel any inconvenience in their living.
					
					 As I visit the splendidly-built barracks of the unit, I remember the words of leader Kim Jong Il that he would certainly visit it, Kim Jong Un noted, adding: How happy we would be if we had come to the unit, accompanying the leader.
					
					 He enjoyed an art performance given by the soldiers of the company at the end of his visit to it.
					
					 They staged such colorful numbers as narration and chorus "Boundless Is Our Yearning", chorus "He Is Our Dear Supreme Commander", chorus and story-telling "Company Is Our Dear Home", poem and chorus "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Cost of Our Lives."
					
					 The supreme commander warmly clapped his hands while watching the performance. He had a talk with the soldiers of the company and had a photo taken with them.
					
					 That day he visited the family of Officer Kang Yong Sun and learned in detail about the construction of houses for officers of the unit.
					
					 He was accompanied by Jang Jong Nam, Son Chol Ju, Jon Chang Bok, Rim Kwang Il and Ri Man Gon.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Breeding Station of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Breeding Station of KPA 
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, gave field guidance to the Breeding Station No. 621 of the KPA now under construction. 
					 He warmly waved back to the enthusiastic cheers of the soldier-builders. 
					
					 He went round different places of the station to learn in detail about its construction. 
					
					 He was greatly pleased to see a large area of grass land and a lot of buildings in vast plottage. 
					
					 He recalled that he initiated the construction of the breeding station with an aim to breed grass-eating animals including goat of good stock and provide them to all units of the KPA and issued an order to start the construction, praising the soldier-builders for having done a lot of work in a short span of time. 
					
					 It is important to successfully conduct scientific researches to massively breed such goats, he said. He learned about what progress was made in the construction of the goat institute, a breeding research centre. 
					
					 After acquainting himself with the construction of dwelling houses for employees of the station, he stressed the need to build good houses in different places so that villages of bliss may appear in the district of the breeding station. 
					
					 Going round the construction sites of various breeding pens, he asked about on what principle they would be built. He underlined the need to reasonably create grass land and distribute buildings.
					
					 He saw goats of good stock being bred at the station. 
					
					 He was told that goat of new species sent by him to the station was faster in breeding and growth and quality of meat was better than the local strains. He called for pushing ahead with the work to widely propagate the goat of good stock. 
					
					 Recollecting the words of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il that meat should be obtained from grass, Kim Jong Un said that the KPA should take the lead in translating the behests of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il into a brilliant reality. 
					
					 The Breeding Station No. 621 of the KPA is an important stockbreeding centre for providing a lot of grass-eating animals of good stock to service personnel, he said, indicating tasks and ways for completing the construction before the Party founding anniversary this year and massively breeding those animals. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Jang Jong Nam, Son Chol Ju, Jon Chang Bok, Rim Kwang Il and Ri Man Gon, chief secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Cameroonian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Cameroonian President
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Paul Biya, president of Cameroon, on Monday on the occasion of the 41st anniversary of the Republic of Cameroon.
					 Kim wished the president and his people success in their efforts to consolidate the stability of the country and achieve economic development, expressing belief that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would grow stronger.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Visits Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Visits Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju visited the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex to review its operation. 
					 Pak held a consultative meeting after touring different places of the complex which is amid a high-pitched drive to increase iron and steel production true to the new line of the Workers' Party of Korea on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force. 
					
					 The meeting underscored the importance of the complex in making a breakthrough in building an economic power. It discussed the issues of increasing iron and steel production. 
					
					 The premier called upon officials and workers of the complex to step up the push to put the production processes on a modern and scientific basis and increase the production capabilities. 
					
					 He pressed for measures for the Cabinet and relevant units to fully provide raw and other materials necessary for keeping production going at a high rate. 
					
					 Next stops of the premier were the sites of the projects for remodeling the Sports Village in Chongchun Street, building Munsu Wading Pool and expanding the Taedonggang Terrapin Factory where he reviewed the progress. 
					
					 He stressed the need to ensure the highest quality in the construction and discussed matters arising in the construction.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Clarify Stand on KIZ
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Clarify Stand on KIZ
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Bureau for Central Guidance for the Development of the Special Zone gave the following answer to KCNA Monday in connection with the fact that the south Korean authorities keep groundlessly pulling up the DPRK while evading the settlement of a fundamental issue for the resumption of the operation in the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ):
					 The south Korean authorities in a statement of a spokesman for the Unification Ministry said that it is "very regretful" that the north declined the dialogue offer and shifted the responsibility and the "north is entirely to blame" for the suspension of the operation in the KIZ and the lack of the south-north consultation. They even said that the north's measure of allowing businessmen to take out goods was an act that aroused skepticism about its sincerity and it was distortion of truth.
					
					 They branded the DPRK's regular military exercises as a "provocation" even though they stage mad-cap nuclear war exercises against it with the involvement of the U.S. super-large nuclear carrier. they even made absurd remarks intentionally linking the exercises with the KIZ.
					
					 The mastermind who pushed the KIZ into the phase of a catastrophe talked about "regret", "responsibility" and "sincerity", shameless sophism distorting the essence of the situation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are busy making excuses following the publication of the DPRK's magnanimous measure over the KIZ issue.
					
					 Had they responded to the DPRK's offer, the KIZ would not have reached such a phase as now, to say nothing of the phase of taking out raw materials and products.
					
					 But they have resorted to a sleight of hand, concealing their sinister design. This resulted in the huge damage to the innocent south Korean businessmen.
					
					 The south Korean authorities claim to have deep interest in the livelihood of the businessmen. But as was proved by a recent statement, they kept silence about the normalization of the operation in the KIZ and touched only on the issue of taking out raw materials and products. This proves that they are not pleased with the resumption of the operation in the KIZ.
					
					 What is more urgent than the taking out of the products is whether to keep or break the KIZ.
					
					 This is an issue on which hinges the living of the south Korean businessmen and the future of the north-south relations.
					
					 What the south Koreans truly want today is the normalization of the operation in the KIZ rather than the taking out of the products from the KIZ.
					
					 Now is the time for the south Korean authorities to state before the public whether it has intent to fundamentally settle the KIZ issue or not.
					
					 They should not try to distort the essence of the issue and deceive the public but clarify its stand on this issue.
					
					 Their attitude will affect the DPRK's decision.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korea's Groundless Accusation over KPA Regular Military Drill Refuted
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korea's Groundless Accusation over KPA Regular Military Drill Refuted 
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Monday in its information bulletin No. 1038 accused the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of pulling up the Korean People's Army over its regular military exercise to bolster up the country's defence capability in every way.
					 A spokesman for the White House blustered that the DPRK "should honor its commitments made before the international community", terming the KPA's rocket launching drills on May 18 and 19 "provocations". Meanwhile, the puppet group of south Korea in a "statement" let loose a whole string of vituperation grumbling about the "north's provocative action" and urging "responsible behavior".
					
					 The information bulletin dismissed this as another unpardonable challenge to the DPRK and an undisguised provocation driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme phase.
					
					 Their description of the drills as a factor of escalating the tension on the peninsula and in the region reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 It is the height of shamelessness for the puppet group to talk about someone's "provocation" as it is hell-bent on the moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen and ignite a war against the north, while imploring its U.S. master to tighten the military alliance.
					
					 They are making desperate efforts to mislead the public opinion through the trumpeting about fictitious "provocations" in a bid to calm down the international community's criticism of their moves to beef up aggressor forces and provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK and escalate their military threat to it.
					
					 Lurking behind their renewed smear campaign is a sinister aim to quell the anti-"government" actions of the south Korean people sparked off by the unpopular policy, sex scandal and the like and get rid of their serious ruling crisis.
					
					 Facts go to clearly prove that the DPRK's line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force is entirely just and it is the only way to defend the country's sovereignty and dignity and achieve the nation's reunification and prosperity.
					
					 The DPRK will bolster up the nuclear deterrence of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army, true to the ever-victorious line and wipe out hostile forces to the last man if they dare infringe upon the DPRK's sovereignty even a bit.

articles.title: DPRK Strives to Prevent Spread of Bird Flu Virus
articles.content:
DPRK Strives to Prevent Spread of Bird Flu Virus
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea has been making big efforts to prevent the spread of the bird flu virus. 
					 According to an examination made by the Central Epizootic Prevention Center and the Veterinary Institute under the Academy of Agricultural Science on May 7, it was found that ducks in the Tudan Duck Farm in Pyongyang were infected with the H5N1 virus by migratory birds. They briefed UN bodies concerned on this situation while taking steps to kill as many as 160 000 ducks in the farm and quarantine and disinfect it.
					
					 More than 1 360 veterinary epidemic control teams are now working throughout the country to keep a close eye on poultry and movement of wild birds. Efforts are made to raise the diagnosis capability of provincial epizootic prevention organs and increase preventive medicines.
					
					 Meanwhile, preventive measures are being taken against H7N9 virus under the direction of the State Emergency Anti-epidemic Committee. They include checkup of persons from the bird flu virus-hit areas, test and quarantine of poultry and restriction on movement of living fowls. A strict step was taken to hedge fowl, duck, pigeon and other domestic poultry off from the outer world.
					
					 Intensive hygienic information service is going on among inhabitants.

articles.title: German Lawmaker Here
articles.content:
German Lawmaker Here
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Jurgen Klimke, member of the Federal Parliament from the Christian Democratic Union of Germany, and his companion arrived here Monday by air.

articles.title: Delegation of Vientiane City Pays Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Delegation of Vientiane City Pays Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Vientiane City of Laos led by Soukanh Mahalath, secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, secretary of  the Vientiane City Party Committee and mayor, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday.
					 The guest laid bunches of flowers before the statues and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The delegation arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: DPRK Boxer Wins Gold Medal at International Tournament
articles.content:
DPRK Boxer Wins Gold Medal at International Tournament
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK boxer Ri Chung Il garnered a gold medal at the international boxing tournament named after Konstatin Korotkov.
					 The tournament, held in Khabarovsk, Russia from May 15 to 19, brought together more than 90 excellent boxers from 17 countries and regions including the DPRK, Germany, Latvia, Hungary, Moldova and Belgium.
					
					 Ri Chung Il excelled all his rivals in the 52kg category.
					
					 Kim Chung Hyok won a silver medal in the same category while Ri Chung Hyok and Kim Kyong Sop bronze medals in the 49kg and 60kg categories each.

articles.title: Premier Soccer League Matches Kick off
articles.content:
Premier Soccer League Matches Kick off
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The premier soccer league matches of the Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize started here on Monday.
					 The league matches which will run through mid June brought together more than ten men and women's football teams including the April 25 Sports Team, the Rimyongsu Sports Team, the Sonbong Sports Team, the Amnokgang Sports Team, the Sports Team of the Ministry of Light Industry and the Wolmido Sports Team. They will play first and second rounds of league matches to decide final standings through semi-finals and finals.
					
					 Today witnessed men's football matches between the Ryongaksan Sports Team and the Sonbong Sports Team (2:0), the Kigwancha Sports Team and the Pyongyang Sports Team (1:0), the April 25 Sports Team and the Sobaeksu Sports Team (1:1), the Wolmido Sports Team and the Amnokgang Sports Team (3:3) at Kim Il Sung Stadium. 
					
					 The league matches go on.

articles.title: New Postage Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Postage Stamps Issued
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- A new kind of postage stamp has been issued in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to mark the 9th China (Beijing) International Garden Exposition.
					 Seen in the upper part of the stamp are Korean, Chinese and English letters reading "A Garden City, A Beautiful Home", a theme of the exposition, as well as an emblem of the exposition.
					
					 The stamp features a painting "A cat on the tree" drawn by Ri Am (1499-?), a Korea's master painter in the 16th century.
					
					 The exposition, which will run from May-November, will draw 20 odd countries, regions and organizations around the world, including the DPRK.
					
					 Meanwhile, four kinds of stamps and a sheetlet picturing owls and monkeys were issued in the country.

articles.title: Folklore Park Built in Haeju City
articles.content:
Folklore Park Built in Haeju City
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The Haeju Folklore Park sprang up in South Hwanghae Province.
					 Historic relics showing the wisdom and talents of ancestors are truthfully depicted. They include several royal mausoleums such as Mausoleums of King Tangun and King Wang Kon, monument to the Mausoleum of King Kwanggaeto, Chomsongdae Observatory and turtle ship.
					
					 There are also the monument to great victory in battle in Yonan Fort and other famous cultural relics in the province.
					
					 The entrance and fence of the park were built in such a way as to retain the former shapes of the south gate and castle wall of Haeju Fort, historic relics.
					
					 There are trees of various species such as bamboos and ginkgo trees inside the park.
					
					 There are also a vast ground for visitors and outdoor stage.
					
					 The park will contribute to educating people and school youth and children in the province in socialist patriotism.

articles.title: Phyongchon Koryo Medicine Pharmaceutical Factory
articles.content:
Phyongchon Koryo Medicine Pharmaceutical Factory
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The Phyongchon Koryo Medicine Pharmaceutical Factory has recently manufactured many kinds of Koryo medicines.
					 Among them are those efficacious for treatment of cerebral and myocardial ischemia, diabetes, indigestion, pain, etc.
					
					 The factory also turns out such tonics as Phalmihwan, Ryukmihwan and Kwibihwan and external remedies.
					
					 The medicines came under the spotlight at the 16th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair. All of the medicines, made from extracts, have no side effect.
					
					 The factory has made big efforts to developing latest medicinal science. In the course it won scores of patent and invention rights.
					
					 Its products were appreciated as locally famous medicines at the national exhibition of scientific and technological achievements in public health and the national sci-tech festival.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Japan's Lurch to Right
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Japan's Lurch to Right
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Japan is now disturbed by the growing tendency of veering to the Right.
					 Waves of ultra-nationalism are sweeping all fabrics of Japanese society and ultra-right forces have become feverish in their activities.
					
					 Japan has become undisguised in its moves to secure a legal guarantee for a war state by revising the "Pacifist Constitution."
					
					 Displeased with the existing Constitution, its ultra-right forces never let a chance pass by without crying out for the "revision of the Constitution" in a bid to turn Japan into a "country to be allowed by the Constitution to keep an army and to carry out a war" through its revision. They have waited for this opportunity.
					
					 Their ulterior intention is to revise the "Pacifist Constitution", which has been in force since the end of the Second World War, as a war constitution and round off the legal foundation for militarizing Japan and launching overseas aggression.
					
					 Keeping pace with the atmosphere of society's rapid lurch to the Right, the Liberal Democratic Party recently worked out a "proposal related to defence" for adopting new "defence programme guidelines".
					
					 The keynote of the proposal calls for exercising the right to collective self-defence and founding "a defence army" through the constitutional revision and acquiring the capability to strike missile launching bases. It also calls for studying nuclear deterrence strategy under the pretext of threat from someone.
					
					 Though the proposal is veiled with the word "defence," it is no more than a war programme for attaining the goal of aggression.
					
					 What matters is that Japan is groundlessly accusing the DPRK. Tokyo is misleading the public opinion at home and abroad, asserting that it is compelled by Pyongyang to exercise the right to collective self-defence, build "the defence army" and attack enemy bases.
					
					 What Japan claimed has nothing to do with defence. It is nothing but an excuse to carry out its scenario for overseas aggression.
					
					 It is the goal of the Japanese reactionaries to turn Japan into a war state with the right to belligerency and the right to participate in a war. The "normal state" touted by Japan precisely means a war state.
					
					 By pursuing a war Japan can never shake off the dishonor of being a defeated nation.
					
					 To legalize militarization and overseas aggression amounts to a criminal act of blatantly challenging the international conventions stipulating Japan's position as a war criminal state, defeated nation.
					
					 Should Japan launches a war of aggression overseas, openly denying its crime-woven past, it will always remain a defeated nation bound to go to ruin.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges Japan to Redeem Its Past
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges Japan to Redeem Its Past
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Japan should turn over a new leaf and follow the present international trend by which various other countries are making sincere efforts to break with the past and win trust of the international community, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined article.
					 It is a well-known fact that the Japanese imperialists inflicted irretrievable pain upon the Asian people including Koreans, notes the article, adding:
					
					 Nevertheless, Japan has neither admitted its sinful past nor made apology for it, let alone reparation.
					
					 On the contrary, absurd sophism distorting and whitewashing the past crimes is being heard throughout Japan. And those in power are taking the lead in it.
					
					 No wonder, Japan has been known internationally as a country which is very reluctant to repent of its sins, a country that justifies those crimes out of its inveterate evil habit.
					
					 However, it is not only out of its ingrained habit that Japan desperately works to falsify and justify its past crimes. Lurking behind this is its own ambition and calculation.
					
					 It is an invariable ambition of the Japanese reactionaries to realize their erstwhile dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere".
					
					 Another aim sought by Japan is to evade the reparation for its past crimes.
					
					 The world community is following with an Argus eye Japan's move of desperately shirking admittance, apology and reparation for its past crimes.
					
					 Japan should make an unconditional and thorough-going apology and reparation to Korea and other Asian countries upon which it inflicted huge damage during its past war and colonial rule over them.

articles.title: Eve Event Marks Kwangju Popular Resistance Anniversary in S. Korea
articles.content:
Eve Event Marks Kwangju Popular Resistance Anniversary in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The committee for event marking the 33rd anniversary of the May 18 popular resistance in south Korea held an eve event on the theme of "Kwangju in May, Again for Peace and Reunification" in the Kumnam Avenue of Kwangju City on Friday.
					 Present there were more than 5,000 people including laid-off workers of Ssangyong Motors, Ryongsan evacuees and representatives of Kangjong village of Jeju Island. 
					
					 Participants in the event called for building a world without war and violence. 
					
					 They held a rally of workers, pilgrimage in May, photo exhibition, art performance, etc. near the Kumnam Avenue.
					
					 About 500 people conducted a memorial service in the May 18 cemetery on the same day.

articles.title: South Koreans Call for Conclusion of Peace Treaty
articles.content:
South Koreans Call for Conclusion of Peace Treaty
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Organizations of various circles in south Korea held a seminar for peace on the Korean peninsula in Kwangju on May 17.
					 Han Chung Mok, co-representative of the People's Action for Peace against War, said the conclusion of a peace treaty serves as the first step to defuse the danger of a war on the peninsula.
					
					 The conclusion of a peace treaty would lead to the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea, he noted, adding:
					
					 An international campaign demanding the conclusion of a peace treaty is under way with the forthcoming July 27 as an occasion and such actions are now under way throughout south Korea.
					
					 He called for making this year, the 60th anniversary of the Korean Armistice Agreement, a year of making a peace treaty.
					
					 Ri Sung Hwan, co-representative of the Joint Conference for Peace on Korean Peninsula, clarified ways for achieving peace.
					
					 Choe Jae Bong, priest of the Missionary Solidarity Council of Christian Community, underscored the need for all the people to unite as one and stage a mass campaign for achieving peace.
					
					 Choe Jin Mi, executive chairwomen of the Women's Solidarity, said her organization would release a peace declaration of women with the upcoming July 27 as an occasion.
					
					 Song Myong Hyon, room chief of the Council for Achieving Peace and Settling Situation in South Kyongsang Province of south Korea, said its regional organizations would stage practical actions.
					
					 Ju Kwan Chol, secretary general of the Headquarters of the Kwangju-South Jolla Provincial Movement for Making the Korean Nation One, called upon all the people to form a big trend for concluding a peace treaty this year.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Flay S. Korean Chief Executive's Trip to U.S.
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Flay S. Korean Chief Executive's Trip to U.S.
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) made public  statements on May 16 condemning the south Korean chief executive's sycophantic and country-selling trip to the U.S.
					 Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, denounced the south Korean chief executive for having worked hard to get approval of her anti-reunification policy from Washington responsible for the situation on the Korean Peninsula which has been pushed to the brink of a nuclear war and seriously rattled the nerves of Pyongyang.
					
					 Ri Jong Man, managing director of the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, said that it was disgusting that the American master and his stooge vociferated about "a package strategic alliance", " blood ties " and "pivot ".
					
					 Kim Cha Dol, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, noted that her despicable behavior is a servile and shameful one which can never be pardoned as she left the independence and dignity of the nation to the tender mercy of outside forces in a bid to stay in power.
					
					 Kang Chu Ryon, chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, warned the chief executive that those who opted for the confrontation with fellow countrymen in collusion with the U.S. were fated to meet a miserable end and death.
					
					 Kim Hwa Hyo, chairman of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, said that during her disgraceful and humiliating U.S. trip she fully revealed her ulterior intention to persistently pursue confrontation, pursuant to the U.S. policy, instead of working for mending the worst inter-Korean ties at any cost.
					
					 Jo Han Ju, chairperson of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers in Japan, held that through her visit to the U.S. she declared that she would become a shock brigade in following the U.S. moves to invade the DPRK and carrying out its strategy for dominating Asia.
					
					 Hwang Myong, chairman of the Chongryon Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters, slammed her recent visit as an unpardonable treacherous and anti-reunification action as it meant following in the footsteps of traitor Lee Myung Bak who pursued the "policy towards the north," rendering the situation extremely tense through nexus with the U.S. and confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 Pu Yong Uk, chairman of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, accused her of making during her recent U.S. junket a spate of silly treacherous remarks such as "trust-building process" and "world peace park" in the demilitarized zone.
					
					 Ro Mu Hyon, chairman of the Hyogo Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, assailed her for further escalating the military tension by introducing the U.S. super-large nuclear carrier as soon as she came back after confirming a closer alliance during her visit to the U.S.
					
					 Mun Kwang Hui, chairperson of the Aichi Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, warned that the south Korean chief executive should bear in mind that she would get nothing through nexus with the U.S. and confrontation with fellow countrymen and would meet the same miserable fate as traitor Lee did.

articles.title: Chinese Media Calls for Int'l Movement for Peace Treaty in Korea
articles.content:
Chinese Media Calls for Int'l Movement for Peace Treaty in Korea
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Chinese website The 4th Media News in a Saturday appeal called for international movement for the conclusion of a peace treaty against war in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia on the lapse of nearly six decades since the conclusion of the Korean Armistice Agreement (AA). 
					 Noting that the Korean nation has remained divided since the 1953 AA in the peninsula and the DPRK has suffered unimaginable damage because of the U.S. ceaseless blockade and nuclear threats, the appeal said the world calls for peace against war for security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia. It declared as follows:
					
					1. AA should be replaced by a permanent peace treaty without fail.
					
					2. With the signing of a peace treaty the U.S. forces should immediately withdraw from south Korea. Only then can Koreans in the north and the south and overseas pool their efforts to achieve peaceful reunification according to their own determination and without any hindrance of outside forces. 
					
					3. The Asia-Pacific region should remain a region of future, a region of peaceful co-existence and co-prosperity. 
					
					4. The Korean Peninsula, Asia-Pacific region and the rest of the world should not be a plaything of warmongers and military monopolies in their design to disturb peace, security and prosperity of mankind and escalate military tension, and that of big powers displaying their strength with an eye on supremacy. 
					
					 The appeal urged to replace the dead AA with a permanent peace treaty.

articles.title: Solidarity Meeting in France Supports DPRK
articles.content:
Solidarity Meeting in France Supports DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- A solidarity meeting in France on May 11 supported the just cause of the Korean people for peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Benoit Quennedey, vice-president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, condemned the U.S. for stubbornly clinging to the hostile policy toward the DPRK out of a wild dream to dominate the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The association took different measures regarding the grave situation that prevailed on the Korean Peninsula due to the U.S. constant moves for igniting a nuclear war, he said.
					
					 He expressed his resolve to frustrate the U.S. imperialists' moves and wage dynamic solidarity activities for supporting the just cause of the Korean people in their efforts to accelerate the building of a prosperous and powerful nation under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Shown was a DPRK film revealing the true colors of the U.S. as a provoker of the Korean war.

articles.title: Lao News Agency Introduces Pyongyang Folklore Park
articles.content:
Lao News Agency Introduces Pyongyang Folklore Park
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The Lao News Agency on May 15 introduced the Pyongyang Folklore Park splendidly built as a grand edifice in the era of Songun.
					 Exhibits there include cultural wealth and relics left by the Korean people in different historical periods as well as creations in modern era in real size or miniature, the news agency said, and went on:
					
					 The Korean nation has a time-honored history spanning five thousand years, brilliant culture and beautiful and peculiar tradition and custom.
					
					 In the historic relics exhibition area one can see the remains and relics dating back to the primitive ages, ancient times and middle ages, all in one place.
					
					 In the folklore village area visitors can see different types of structures built on the principle of historical realism.
					
					 Those who enter the contemporary times area can get a view of Mt. Paektu, holy mountain of Korea.
					
					 The news agency, reporting about the miniatures of the grand edifices built by the Korean people under the wise leadership of the illustrious great men born of Mt. Paektu in the contemporary times area, said the folklore park is a stark reminder of the long and shining history of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Austrian Paper Supports DPRK's Stand
articles.content:
Austrian Paper Supports DPRK's Stand 
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The Austrian newspaper Wiener Zeitung on May 14 carried an article titled "Cool heated head and think reasonably". 
					 Noting that the Korean Peninsula is on the edge of extremely dangerous nuclear crisis, the article went on:
					
					 For the U.S. the Korean Peninsula is just an advanced base necessary for the invasion of continent. 
					
					 The U.S. was busy branding the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes as an unjust one to justify its aggression moves. 
					
					 To stifle the DPRK is the U.S. design and it is a chieftain that has escalated the DPRK-U.S. confrontation into a nuclear standoff. 
					
					 The U.S. turned south Korea into the biggest nuclear arsenal in the Far East despite the DPRK's efforts for peace. 
					
					 The Korean Peninsula would have already become a denuclearized zone if the U.S. had not deployed nukes in south Korea. 
					
					 The DPRK was forced to possess nuclear weapons to defend security and peace of the country. 
					
					 It is a final conclusion drawn by the DPRK to deal nukes with nukes. 
					
					 Therefore, the DPRK set forth a new line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force. 
					
					 The DPRK's tough countermeasures are oriented to ending the U.S. hostile policy towards it. 
					
					 The DPRK demands the U.S. cool its heated head and think reasonably.

articles.title: Voice of Russia Decries U.S.-S. Korea Naval Drill
articles.content:
Voice of Russia Decries U.S.-S. Korea Naval Drill
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Voice of Russia on May 14 aired an article titled "Vicious Cycle of Tension in Korean Peninsula" which denounced the naval striking drill staged by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers. 
					 The U.S. nuclear-powered carrier Nimitz took part in the U.S.-south Korea joint naval war drill, seriously threatening the security of the DPRK, the radio said, and went on:
					
					 Most of experts see the U.S. behavior as a provocation stemming from misguided way of thinking. 
					
					 The U.S. is continuously seeking policy of strength. 
					
					 That is why the DPRK cannot but regard the joint naval drill as a provocation. 
					
					 The danger in the Korean Peninsula has not yet been removed. 
					
					 The U.S. spends a huge amount of fund in showing off strength in the peninsula. Its goal is to expand the sphere of domination in the region. 
					
					 Experts say that this does not contribute to the security of south Korea and the detente of the peninsula. 
					
					 The situation of the peninsula will aggravate again in July in which the 60th anniversary of the Armistice Agreement falls and in August when there will take place another round of a U.S.-south Korea joint military drill. 
					
					 The vicious cycle repeats in the Korean Peninsula and the way out is becoming narrower.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre campamento de ninos en monte Myohyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre campamento de ninos en monte Myohyang
Pyongyang, 20 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, junto con  Ri Sol Ju, visito el dia 19 el Campamento de Ninos para el Alpinismo en el Monte Myohyang de la ciudad de Pyongyang, situado al pie del monte Myohyang de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte.
					Llegado a la lapida, en que estan escritas las palabras del Presidente Kim Il Sung, segun las cuales si uno se divierte en el campamento en el curso de escuela secundaria no  lo olvidara nunca en  toda su vida, el Mariscal dijo que esas son de veras las palabras significativas y recordo con emocion la historia de amor para las generaciones venideras del Presidente quien hizo construir los campamentos de ninos en los lugares pintorescos del pais.
					
					Destaco que en el ultimo periodo de su vida el Dirigente Kim Jong Il dio en varias ocasiones las instrucciones de reconstruir magnificamente susodicho campamento y vio tambien el diseno concerniente y agrego que deben materializar sin falta el legado del Dirigente de levantar mejores campamentos para los ninos.
					
					Averiguo en detalles el estado de vida de campamento de los miembros de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea (ONC) recorriendo el domicilio, la sala de divulgacion de conocimientos de alpinismo, el cuarto de ONC, la sala de propaganda cultural, la de conservacion de regalos, el salon de musica, el comedor, la casa cultural y otros puntos.
					
					El acondicionamiento del campamento en cuestion conforme a la demanda de la era del Songun resulta una labor importante para satisfacer los deseos de los grandes Generalisimos, quienes siendo padres de los ninos, dedicaron todos los suyos para la infancia, recalco y senalo la necesidad de construirlo nuevamente.
					
					Cada vez que escucho las canciones "No envidiamos nada a nadie en el mundo" y "El General, al frente y los ninos, al campamento", pienso en el amor por las generaciones venideras de los Generalisimos, apunto y subrayo que no hay que escatimar la inversion para la construccion exitosa del campamento, aunque tenemos muchas cosas que hacer para edificar un Estado prospero.
					
					Asevero que la decision del PTC es reconstruir magnificamente los campamentos, palacios escolares y casas de los ninos de todo el pais.
					
					Es necesario reconstruir los campamentos del pais conforme a las caracteristicas de las localidades, inclusive las montanosas y litorales, para lo cual es necesario trazar bien los disenos, acoto y prometio que les enviara el diseno estandard.
					
					Practicamos la revolucion superando todas las dificultades y penas para nuestros ninos, dijo y agrego que deben ofrecerles la mejor  felicidad en el mundo.
					
					El mismo dia, el Mariscal se reunio con los miembros de la ONC de diversas escuelas que pasan los dias de campamento y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del EPC, Choe Ryong Hae, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Choe Hui, primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC y Pak Thae Song, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: BGDCDZE demanda al Sur de Corea aclarar la posicion sobre ZIK
articles.content:
BGDCDZE demanda al Sur de Corea aclarar la posicion sobre ZIK
Pyongyang, 20 de mayo (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que las autoridades surcoreanas acusan injustamente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea eludiendo la solucion del problema fundamental para reanudar las labores de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong en suspension temporal, el portavoz del Buro General de Direccion Central sobre el Desarrollo de Zona Especial dio el dia 20 la siguiente respuesta a la ACNC:
					En la declaracion del portavoz del Ministerio de Unificacion, publicada el dia 19, las autoridades surcoreanas dijeron que "fue muy lamentable" que el Norte de Corea haya desvirtuado la propuesta de dialogo e imputado a otro la responsabilidad y que este es el responsable de la cesantia de la ZIK y de la no apertura de las negociaciones Sur-Norte. Y disparatearon que "es muy dudosa" la medida del Norte de permitir a los empresarios la salida de materiales. 
					
					Ademas, sin decir nada de sus freneticos ejercicios de guerra nuclear contra la RPDC, librados con la participacion del superportaaviones nuclear norteamericano, califican de "provocacion" los ejercicios militares normales de la RPDC y los vinculan artificialmente con la ZIK. 
					
					Es una conducta cinica que el culpable de la cierre de la ZIK hable de "lastima", "responsabilidad" y "sinceridad" de alguien. 
					
					Al darse a la publicidad la magnanima medida de la RPDC sobre la ZIK, las autoridades surcoreanas se apresuran a buscar una excusa con que puedan frenar la repercusion de ella. 
					
					Si ellas hubieran aceptado nuestra propuesta, no habria surgido el problema de salida de materias primas y productos ni habria caido en la crisis actual la ZIK. 
					
					Pero, los inocentes empresarios surcoreanos tienen que sufrir enormes perdidas por las autoridades surcoreanas que hacen todo lo posible para ocultar su malsana intencion. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas actuan como si tuvieran gran interes en los negocios de los empresarios. Pero, como muestra la reciente declaracion, hablaron solo de la salida de materias primas y productos sin decir nada de la normalizacion de la ZIK. 
					
					Esto demuestra que ellas no quieren la reapertura de la ZIK. 
					
					Ahora lo mas urgente en la ZIK no es la salida de los productos, sino el cierre o no de la ZIK, del cual dependen la subsistencia de los empresarios surcoreanos y la perspectiva de las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Hoy dia, la poblacion surcoreana desea de todo corazon la normalizacion de la ZIK. 
					
					Ahora es el momento en que las autoridades surcoreanas deben aclarar al interior y exterior la voluntad de resolver fundamentalmente o no el problema de la ZIK, sin tergiversar la esencia ni enganar la opinion publica. 
					
					Nuestra decision dependera de la actitud posterior de las autoridades surcoreanas.

articles.title: CRPP rechaza nueva acusacion de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP rechaza nueva acusacion de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 20 de mayo (ACNC) -- En su informacion no. 1038 publicada el dia 20, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria denuncio a los imperialistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos que censuran los rutinarios ejercicios militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea para consolidar por todos los medios la capacidad de defensa nacional. 
					El portavoz de la Casa Blanca calumnio los recientes ejercicios de lanzamiento de cohetes del EPC como una "provocacion" diciendo que "el Norte de Corea debe cumplir su compromiso con la sociedad internacional", mientras que los titeres surcoreanos publicaron una "declaracion" hablando de "accion provocativa del Norte" y de "urgirle la conducta responsable".
					
					Esto es otro desafio nunca tolerable a la RPDC y una provocacion abierta que lleva al extremo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, revela la nota y continua: 
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos dicen como si los ejercicios militares de nuestro ejercito fueran motivo de la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y la region. Pero, esto es un acto cinico que parte de la logica de bandido.
					
					En particular, es el climax de cinismo el hecho de que quien habla de la "provocacion" de alguien fuera la banda titere surcoreana que se entrega a la confrontacion fratricida y la provocacion de guerra contra la RPDC mendigando a su amo norteamericano el fortalecimiento de la alianza militar. 
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos se desesperan por inducir en error la opinion publica hablando de la supuesta "provocacion" con el designio criminal de eludir las criticas de la sociedad internacional a su aumento armamentista y sus maniobras de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC, recrudecer la amenaza de agresion militar contra ella, y a la larga, apaciguar el ambiente de lucha anti-"gobierno" de la poblacion surcoreana, irritada por las politicas antinacionales y antipopulares, el caso de violacion sexual, etc. y salir de la "crisis" de dominacion. 
					
					La realidad demuestra claramente que nuestra linea de desarrollar paralelamente la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares es muy justa y unica via para defender la soberania y dignidad del pais y lograr la reunificacion y prosperidad de la nacion. 
					
					Consolidaremos mil veces mas el disuasivo nuclear del ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu sosteniendo en alto la siempre victoriosa linea sobre el desarrollo paralelo y aniquilaremos despiadadamente a la horda de invasores que se atrevan a atentar, aunque en lo minimo, contra nuestra soberania nacional.

articles.title: ACNC critica derechizacion de sociedad japonesa
articles.content:
ACNC critica derechizacion de sociedad japonesa
Pyongyang, 20 de mayo (ACNC) -- En estos tiempos, la sociedad japonesa se contagia con la fiebre de derechizacion. 
					Aprovechando la corriente ultranacionalista, las fuerzas ultraderechistas del Japon actuan intensamente para enmendar la "constitucion pacifista" en funcion de preparar la garantia legal de Estado belico.
					
					Descontentas de la constitucion vigente, vinieron intentando modificarla para poder tener un ejercito y tener la capacidad de ejecutar la guerra y para sentar la base legal de militarizacion y expansionismo a ultramar. 
					
					El Partido Democratico Liberal elaboro recientemente el llamado "proyecto sobre la defensa" para la aprobacion de nuevo "programa de defensa". 
					
					El proyecto estipula el ejercicio de derecho a la autodefensa colectiva y la fundacion del ejercito de defensa nacional mediante la "enmienda de la constitucion", la disposicion de capacidad de ataque contra las bases de lanzamiento de misil y el estudio sobre la estrategia de disuasivo nuclear bajo el pretexto de la amenaza de alguien.
					
					Lo problematico es que el pais isleno acusa a la RPDC induciendo en error la opinion publica interna y externa como si tuviera la necesidad de ejercer el derecho a la autodefensa colectiva, fundar el "ejercito de defensa nacional" y atacar las bases enemigas para hacer frente a la RPDC. 
					
					Pero, ese argumento no pasa de ser un pretexto para realizar su ambicion de agredir a ultramar. 
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses tienen la meta de convertir a Japon en el pais con el derecho a la beligerancia y a la participacion en guerra. Pues, el "Estado normal" de que habla el pais isla es el de guerra. 
					
					Con la guerra no se puede cambiar su posicion de pais criminal y derrotado. 
					
					La justificacion de militarizacion y de agresion a ultramar deviene un crimen y desafio abierto a los convenios internacionales que fijan ese estatus de Japon. 
					
					Si Japon desata la guerra de agresion a ultramar negando abiertamente sus crimenes sangrientos del pasado e inclinandose a la derechizacion, se quedara siempre como pais derrotado.
